article_title: New Hospital Company Poised To Tap ACA's Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: As more states opt to expand Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act, a new investor-owned hospital company is poised to tap an emerging market of Americans in rural areas and smaller communities gaining health coverage. Community Health Systems (CYH) said Monday it will spin off to its shareholders a group of [...]
